item.description:
Hi Everyone
Janice is having a Birthday Party,

al-r : Bring those Kayak Paddles for the Spanking..LOL

Come spend a wintry night helping Janice celebrate her birthday. Saturday, January 12, 2008, 6:00 p.m. until much later.
Save the date for fun and partying. I would like folks to sign up to bring items needed for dinner and cocktails.

This list on stuff to bring will be finalized and posted very soon.

We dont want too much or too much of all the same thing..LOL...

Those responding to the event will be provided with location and directions closer to the event.


Janice

General Geographic Location is a few miles north of the BuckTooth Hill Mall in Manchester/Southwindsor line area.

Ok I update as the time gets closer..al-r

Update 1
Come Help Janice celebrate another Birthday

Saturday, January 12, 2008
The Club House at my condo complex
6:00 p.m. until later

It?s a meet and greet and celebrate and eating kind of an event

I need help the supplies for the evening. Below is a list of needed items, email me that you are attending and what you will bring. I will send you the directions to birthday central.

I am looking forward to enjoying my birthday with you!

update 2

Salad Bar:
5lbs lettuce greens
tomatos
cucumbers
carrots
celery
croutons
assorted dressings

Paper goods:
50 plates
100 cups
50 forks, knives, spoons
50 bowls for dessert
napkins

Pasta Bar:
5lbs spaghetti and ziti
red sauce 4 quarts
alfredo sauce 4 quarts
meatballs 5lbs
shrimp 5lbs
shaker cheese
bread/butter

Serving items:
50 plates
100 cups
50 forks, knives, spoons
50 bowls for dessert
napkins..........
if you have large
serving containers
and crock pots,
let me know..

Let me know what amounts you can provide to the event. The amounts above are the totals I am estimating for dinner.

Enjoy your holidays,
Janice

group.who: River and Shore Kayak-r's of CT
group.name: ~~~~HARTFORD COUNTY RIVERS & CT SHORE KAYAK GROUP~~~~ HCR-SK

item.name: A Cold Weather "Paddling" Event
